title: Introduction

title: The White Sox Failed rebuild
text:
Code
library(tidyverse)
library(ggrepel)

mlbgamescores2016 <- read_csv("mlbgamescores2016.csv") |> mutate(Season = 2016)

mlbgamescores2017 <- read_csv("mlbgamescores2017.csv") |> mutate(Season = 2017)

mlbgamescores2018 <- read_csv("mlbgamescores2018.csv") |> mutate(Season = 2018)

mlbgamescores2019 <- read_csv("mlbgamescores2019.csv") |> mutate(Season = 2019)

mlbgamescores2020 <- read_csv("mlbgamescores2020.csv") |> mutate(Season = 2020)

mlbgamescores2021 <- read_csv("mlbgamescores2021.csv") |> mutate(Season = 2021)

mlbgamescores2022 <- read_csv("mlbgamescores2022.csv") |> mutate(Season = 2022)

mlbgamescores2023 <- read_csv("mlbgamescores2023.csv") |> mutate(Season = 2023) 

mlbgamelogs <- bind_rows(mlbgamescores2016, mlbgamescores2017, mlbgamescores2018, mlbgamescores2019, mlbgamescores2020, mlbgamescores2021, mlbgamescores2022, mlbgamescores2023)

mlboverall <- mlbgamelogs |> group_by(Season, Tm) |> arrange(Tm, Date) |> filter(Wins == max(Wins) & Losses == max(Losses)) |> mutate(WinPCT = Wins/(Wins + Losses))

whitesoxpct <- mlboverall |> filter(Tm == "CHW")

atlantapct <- mlboverall |> filter(Tm == "ATL")

padrespct <- mlboverall |> filter(Tm == "SDP")

ggplot() + 
  geom_line(data=mlboverall, aes(x=Season, y=WinPCT, group=Tm), color = "grey")  +
  geom_line(data=whitesoxpct, aes(x=Season, y=WinPCT, group=Tm), color = "black") +
  geom_line(data=atlantapct, aes(x=Season, y=WinPCT, group=Tm), color = "red") +
  geom_line(data=padrespct, aes(x=Season, y=WinPCT, group=Tm), color = "#FFC425") +
  geom_point(aes(x=2016, y=.481), color="black") +
  geom_text(aes(x=2016, y=.495, label="78-84"), size=3, color="black") +
  geom_point(aes(x=2017, y=.414), color="black") +
  geom_text(aes(x=2017, y=.400, label="67-95"), size=3, color="black") +
  geom_point(aes(x=2018, y=.383), color="black") +
  geom_text(aes(x=2018, y=.369, label="62-100"), size=3, color="black") +
  geom_point(aes(x=2019, y=.447), color="black") +
  geom_text(aes(x=2019, y=.475, label="72-89"), size=3, color="black") +
  geom_point(aes(x=2020, y=.583), color="black") +
  geom_text(aes(x=2020, y=.550, label="35-25"), size=3, color="black") +
  geom_point(aes(x=2021, y=.574), color="black") +
  geom_text(aes(x=2021, y=.585, label="93-69"), size=3, color="black") +
  geom_point(aes(x=2022, y=.500), color="black") +
  geom_text(aes(x=2022, y=.520, label="81-81"), size=3, color="black") +
  geom_point(aes(x=2023, y=.377), color="black") +
  geom_text(aes(x=2023, y=.365, label="61-101"), size=3, color="black") +
  geom_point(aes(x=2016, y=.422), color="red") +
  geom_text(aes(x=2016, y=.438, label="68-93"), size=3, color="red") +
  geom_point(aes(x=2017, y=.444), color="red") +
  geom_text(aes(x=2017, y=.475, label="72-90"), size=3, color="red") +
  geom_point(aes(x=2018, y=.556), color="red") +
  geom_text(aes(x=2018, y=.570, label="90-72"), size=3, color="red") +
  geom_point(aes(x=2019, y=.599), color="red") +
  geom_text(aes(x=2019, y=.610, label="97-65"), size=3, color="red") +
  geom_point(aes(x=2020, y=.583), color="red") +
  geom_text(aes(x=2020, y=.565, label="35-25"), size=3, color="red") +
  geom_point(aes(x=2021, y=.547), color="red") +
  geom_text(aes(x=2021, y=.532, label="88-73"), size=3, color="red") +
  geom_point(aes(x=2022, y=.623), color="red") +
  geom_text(aes(x=2022, y=.635, label="101-61"), size=3, color="red") +
  geom_point(aes(x=2023, y=.642), color="red") +
  geom_text(aes(x=2023, y=.653, label="104-58"), size=3, color="red") +
  geom_point(aes(x=2016, y=.420), color="#FFC425") +
  geom_text(aes(x=2016, y=.410, label="68-94"), size=3, color="#2F241D") +
  geom_point(aes(x=2017, y=.438), color="#FFC425") +
  geom_text(aes(x=2017, y=.385, label="71-91"), size=3, color="#2F241D") +
  geom_point(aes(x=2018, y=.407), color="#FFC425") +
  geom_text(aes(x=2018, y=.420, label="66-96"), size=3, color="#2F241D") +
  geom_point(aes(x=2019, y=.432), color="#FFC425") +
  geom_text(aes(x=2019, y=.420, label="70-92"), size=3, color="#2F241D") +
  geom_point(aes(x=2020, y=.617), color="#FFC425") +
  geom_text(aes(x=2020, y=.629, label="37-23"), size=3, color="#2F241D") +
  geom_point(aes(x=2021, y=.488), color="#FFC425") +
  geom_text(aes(x=2021, y=.475, label="79-83"), size=3, color="#2F241D") +
  geom_point(aes(x=2022, y=.549), color="#FFC425") +
  geom_text(aes(x=2022, y=.560, label="89-73"), size=3, color="#2F241D") +
  geom_point(aes(x=2023, y=.506), color="#FFC425") +
  geom_text(aes(x=2023, y=.520, label="82-80"), size=3, color="#2F241D") +
  theme_minimal()
